content:
@Nagesh Bashyam problems with womens-health-registries IG:

  • the version is a problem - it should be 0.1.0 not 1.0.0.
  • the header and footer need updating
  • there's no package-list.json
We had a version that went to ballot in fall, 0.1.0, can i make this version 0.2.0 ?
@Grahame Grieve I have fixed these. Please take a look and let me know if it is good or if any more changes are required.
yes getting there - just a few things left; see https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/coordinated-registry-network/qa.html - the publication check section at the top of the page @Nagesh Bashyam

also can we take the _s out of the title bar, and can you update the footer per the discussion (https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179165-committers/topic/Changed.20Publication.20Requirement I think)

@Grahame Grieve Fixed per new QA pub requirements. I get the following requirement :
package-list.json: No entry found for version 0.2.0
But this is the current version. I can make it either current or "0.2.0" .

If I make it 0.2.0 , the following comes up although "desc" is already present.
package-list.json entry: must have a 'desc' (though the value doesn't matter)
'desc' there is a typo - should be 'date'
you are making an entry for what will be 0.2.0 when I publish it this week
so leave the current entry in place and make a new item for 0.2.0
